techmeme.title: House GOP leaders announce a regulatory Crypto Week from July 14 to July 18 to consider three key crypto bills, including the Senate-led GENIUS Act (Jesse Coghlan/Cointelegraph)
A look at Meta's recent hires for its nascent superintelligence unit, including Pei Sun, who developed two generations of Waymo's perception models (Rachyl Jones/Semafor)
Over the past year, long-time Bitcoin whales have been selling off their holdings, leading to a reshaping of the market as institutions increase their buying (Olga Kharif/Bloomberg)
Two dormant Bitcoin wallets, each holding 10,000 "Satoshi era" BTC since 2011, transferred the coins to new wallets using a modern, lower-fee address format (Shaurya Malwa/CoinDesk)
The term "superintelligence" is becoming increasingly popular among AI leaders, even as many in the industry question whether it is ill-defined and overhyped (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
